mapper.select: SELECT T_YEAR_SEMESTER.YEAR_SEMESTER_IDX , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.YEAR , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.SEMESTER , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.START_DATETIME , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.END_DATETIME , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.USE_YN , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.DELETE_YN , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.CREATE_USER_IDX , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.UPDATE_USER_IDX , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.DELETE_USER_IDX , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.UPDATE_DATETIME , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.CREATE_DATETIME , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.DELETE_DATETIME , T_USER_CREATE.USER_NAME AS CREATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_UPDATE.USER_NAME AS UPDATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_DELETE.USER_NAME AS DELETE_USER_NAME FROM TB_YEAR_SEMESTER AS T_YEAR_SEMESTER LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_CREATE ON T_USER_CREATE.USER_IDX = T_YEAR_SEMESTER.CREATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_UPDATE ON T_USER_UPDATE.USER_IDX = T_YEAR_SEMESTER.UPDATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_DELETE ON T_USER_DELETE.USER_IDX = T_YEAR_SEMESTER.DELETE_USER_IDX WHERE T_YEAR_SEMESTER.YEAR_SEMESTER_IDX = #{yearSemesterIdx} LIMIT 1
